name: Re: Duck
description:
Re: Duck is a Game created for the "The GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022".

It tries to follow the Theme of "Death is only the beginning" while trying to make something unique.

It's about a Duck who recently got into the military, after a few talks with the commander, he goes into a mission. Though while on the way, an ambush happens and the protagonist dies, but not for long, as he is capable of taking over the enemies and continue on. He also discovers, that they took the commander. Will he be able to save him?

Team:

Gasterbuzzer (Project Leader/Main Developer)

Duckles_3 (Main Artist/Developer)

Encryqed (Game Designer/Developer)

TheSqueaky (System Developer/Fullstack)

Note: Game Artwork is still in work.
